nodes.text: Vanya Sha was a self-taught female cyborg artist who created the recruitment poster "Join the SAGroup"" for COMPNOR's Sub-Adult Group based on a concept by Imperial Minister of Information Pollux Hax during the Galactic Civil War against the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Her career came to an end when pro-Alliance slicers hacked into the information cache of her AJ^6 cyborg construct headpiece and revealed that she had anti-Imperial sympathies. Sha enhanced her natural talents with knowledge cartridges plugged into her headpiece.
Vanya Sha was first mentioned in Star Wars Propaganda: A History of Persuasive Art in the Galaxy, a reference book written by Pablo Hidalgo and released on October 25, 2016.
